title: Piccoli equivoci / Little Misunderstandings (Comedy, 1989) by Ricky Tognazzi | Movie

sources.title: Piccoli equivoci / Little Misunderstandings (Comedy, 1989) by Ricky Tognazzi | Movie
sources.description:
Paolo is an actor still in love with Francesca, his former partner, and wanders around the apartment where they are loved and separated. He is determined to stay there.

Original title: Piccoli equivoci (1989) AKA: Little Misunderstandings

This film has Italian audio, with subtitles in many languages,

Director: Ricky Tognazzi
Writers: Claudio Bigagli, Simona Izzo, Ruggero Maccari
Stars: Sergio Castellitto, Lina Sastri, Nancy Brilli
Genres: Italian cinema, Comedy, Romance


00:00 Full Italian Movie (with subtitles)
